title: Cytotoxicity of CS-LZ Nanoparticles for Future Biomedical Applications
content: This research investigated the cytotoxicity of chitosan nanoparticles loaded with lysozyme, exploring their viability for biomedical applications. It focused on retinal pigment epithelial cells (ARPE-19), relevant to ocular diseases. DAPI and phalloidin staining techniques along with fluorescence microscopy were utilized to evaluate cellular morphological changes indicative of cytotoxicity.
